== Thrissur (M Corp.) (803280) ==

Thrissur (M Corp.) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 101.42 sq. km. and harbouring 78336 households with total population of 315957 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 295 km. Male population is 152296 and female population is 163661. Scheduled Caste population is 24210 and Scheduled Tribes population is 605. Census Location Code of the town is 803280<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class I (population_total > 1,00,000).
The civic status of the town is ''.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 0 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 79 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 0 km.
